sources.title: Taming of the Fire
sources.description:
Picture about development of Soviet rocket engineering – from its inception to the creation of super-long-range rockets. At the center of the film is the fate of Andrei Bashkirtsev – the chief designer, a talented man who dedicated his life to a great goal – the exploration of space.

IMDb: 7.2

Year of production: 1972

Director: Daniil Khrabrovitsky
Writer: Daniil Khrabrovitsky
Composer: Andrey Petrov
Camera operator: Sergey Vronsky
Production designer: Yuri Kladienko

Cast: Zinovy ​​Gerdt, Vsevolod Safonov, Innokenty Smoktunovsky, Igor Gorbachev, Andrey Popov, Kirill Lavrov, Igor Vladimirov, Ada Rogovtseva, Svetlana Korkoshko, Yuri Leonidov, Igor Petrovsky, Evgeny Steblov, Andro Kobaladze, Galiks Kolchitsky, Vera Kuznetsova, Vadim Spiridonov, Evgeny Matveyev, Vladimir Deyanov, Petr Shelokhonov
